channel.title: 2 worlds
channel.description: ok guys so i have 3 pcs and ive made 2 of them run servers on different ports and my server accesses same character file, this makes it so i have 2 worlds but only problem with this is you can log on your character on both worlds at the same time creating the capability of purposely rolling your character back any ideas on how to make it so you cant log if your character is in use on another world?

item.title: 2 worlds
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

Search for “one thread per client”. If they are both running from exactly the same file this should work

Read full topic

item.title: 2 worlds

item.description:
@burnout wrote:

ok guys so i have 3 pcs and ive made 2 of them run servers on different ports and my server accesses same character file, this makes it so i have 2 worlds but only problem with this is you can log on your character on both worlds at the same time creating the capability of purposely rolling your character back any ideas on how to make it so you cant log if your character is in use on another world?
